price: Uyu munsi nta ncungu yanyu (mwe ndyarya) cyangwa iy’abahakanye iri bwakirwe. Ubuturo bwanyu ni mu muriro. Ni wo muzabana kandi ni na wo herezo ribi.
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا يُؤۡخَذُ مِنكُمۡ فِدۡيَةٞ وَلَا مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۚ مَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ هِيَ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma lā yu'khadhu minkum fid'yatun walā mina alladhīna kafarū mawākumu al-nāru hiya mawlākum wabi'sa al-maṣīru
